name: Suiteshare
headline: Integrate your store with the Suiteshare platform
overview: This app integrates your store with the Suiteshare platform, adding the whatsapp widget to all pages
features: Adds Suiteshare's whatsapp widget to all store pages
additionalInformation: In order to use this app you need to have an active account on Suiteshare and configure your integration ID in the App Settings.
